languages.text: "Понимаю. Порой нечто прекрасное может возникнуть из случайного сочетания цветов на небесной палитре. Или запутанных нитей судьбы двух душ, переплетенных в особый момент. В этой неожиданности и неуловимости момента окружающий мир приобретает особую привлекательность".

"I understand. There are times when something sublime can arise from the accidental combination of colours on the celestial palette. Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."
languages.original_text: "Понимаю. Порой нечто прекрасное может возникнуть из случайного сочетания цветов на небесной палитре. Или запутанных нитей судьбы двух душ, переплетенных в особый момент. В этой неожиданности и неуловимости момента окружающий мир приобретает особую привлекательность".

Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."

"I understand. There are times when something sublime can arise from the accidental combination of colours on the celestial palette. Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."

languages.text: «Entiendo. A veces puede surgir algo sublime de la combinación accidental de los colores de la paleta celestial. O de los destinos entrelazados de dos almas que se unen en un momento específico de sus vidas. En ese instante inesperado e inaprensivo, el mundo se torna particularmente fascinante».
languages.original_text: "I understand. There are times when something sublime can arise from the accidental combination of colours on the celestial palette. Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo. A veces puede surgir algo sublime de la combinación accidental de los colores de la paleta celestial. O de los destinos entrelazados de dos almas que se unen en un momento específico de sus vidas. En ese instante inesperado e inaprensivo, el mundo se torna particularmente fascinante».

languages.text: 「そうだ。神のパレットの偶然の色の組み合わせから、崇高なものが生まれることがある。あるいは特定の瞬間にふたつの魂が偶然に織り成す運命の糸の絡まりから。この予期せぬ、とらえどころのない瞬間があるからこそ、この世界は特別な魅力を発している」
languages.original_text: "I understand. There are times when something sublime can arise from the accidental combination of colours on the celestial palette. Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。神のパレットの偶然の色の組み合わせから、崇高なものが生まれることがある。あるいは特定の瞬間にふたつの魂が偶然に織り成す運命の糸の絡まりから。この予期せぬ、とらえどころのない瞬間があるからこそ、この世界は特別な魅力を発している」

languages.text: “我理解你的想法。命运的调色板上可能混合出令人惊叹的颜色，两个灵魂也可能在命运的冥冥指引下诞生奇妙的缘分。正是这些神秘莫测、不可预知的瞬间，赋予宇宙无与伦比的迷人魅力。”
languages.original_text: "I understand. There are times when something sublime can arise from the accidental combination of colours on the celestial palette. Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."

traits.locale_text: “我理解你的想法。命运的调色板上可能混合出令人惊叹的颜色，两个灵魂也可能在命运的冥冥指引下诞生奇妙的缘分。正是这些神秘莫测、不可预知的瞬间，赋予宇宙无与伦比的迷人魅力。”

languages.text: « Je comprends. Il arrive que la combinaison accidentelle des couleurs de la palette céleste produise quelque chose de sublime, ou qu'une merveille naisse lorsque les fils du destin de deux âmes s'entremêlent à un moment donné. Dans ces instants imprévus et fugaces, le monde acquiert un éclat particulier. »
languages.original_text: "I understand. There are times when something sublime can arise from the accidental combination of colours on the celestial palette. Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends. Il arrive que la combinaison accidentelle des couleurs de la palette céleste produise quelque chose de sublime, ou qu'une merveille naisse lorsque les fils du destin de deux âmes s'entremêlent à un moment donné. Dans ces instants imprévus et fugaces, le monde acquiert un éclat particulier. »

languages.text: "Ich verstehe. Es gibt Zeiten, in denen sich aus der zufälligen Kombination von Farben auf der himmlischen Palette etwas Erhabenes ergeben kann. Oder aus den verworrenen Schicksalsfäden zweier Seelen, die sich in einem bestimmten Augenblick miteinander verweben. In diesem unerwarteten und flüchtigen Moment gewinnt die Welt einen ganz besonderen Reiz."
languages.original_text: "I understand. There are times when something sublime can arise from the accidental combination of colours on the celestial palette. Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe. Es gibt Zeiten, in denen sich aus der zufälligen Kombination von Farben auf der himmlischen Palette etwas Erhabenes ergeben kann. Oder aus den verworrenen Schicksalsfäden zweier Seelen, die sich in einem bestimmten Augenblick miteinander verweben. In diesem unerwarteten und flüchtigen Moment gewinnt die Welt einen ganz besonderen Reiz."

languages.text: "Anlıyorum. Bazen göksel bir renk paletinde kazara birbirine karışan renklerden veya belirli bir anda birbirine karışan iki ruhun karmaşık kader ağlarından yüce bir şey doğabilir. Bu beklenmedik ve anlaşılması zor anda dünya, özel bir çekim oluşturur."
languages.original_text: "I understand. There are times when something sublime can arise from the accidental combination of colours on the celestial palette. Or from the tangled threads of fate of two souls weaving together at a particular moment. In this unexpected and elusive instant, the world acquires a particular allure."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum. Bazen göksel bir renk paletinde kazara karışan renklerden veya belirli bir anda birbirine karışan iki ruhun karmaşık kader ağlarından yüce bir şey doğabilir. Bu beklenmedik ve anlaşılması zor anda, dünya özel bir çekim oluşturur."
